title: Task Integration with GTD system
description: Connect to Joi's GTD system (Apple Reminders). Colleagues can ask Jibot what Joi is working on or add items to his inbox via Slack.

title: Fact categories or tags
description: Allow facts to be categorized or tagged (e.g., 'work', 'interests', 'location'). Enable filtering and organizing facts by category.

title: Slack slash commands (/jibot)
description: Add slash command support as an alternative to @jibot mentions. Example: /jibot who is @alice, /jibot @bob is a developer

title: Contact Management
description: Track relationships, conversation history, and context about people across systems. Build a richer understanding of contacts beyond simple facts.

title: Delegation Interface
description: Accept tasks via Slack that flow into Joi's task management system. Allow colleagues to delegate work to Joi through Jibot.

title: 'On this day' feature
description: Show facts that were added on this date in previous years. Could be a daily digest or a command like 'jibot on this day'.

title: Investigate Slack WebSocket connection issues
description: Logs show recurring pong timeouts and 408 errors from Slack socket-mode. The bot reconnects but connections are unstable. Need to investigate: 1) Is this a network issue? 2) Slack API issues? 3) Should we add better reconnection logic?
close_reason: Fixed by increasing clientPingTimeout from 5s to 30s and serverPingTimeout from 30s to 60s. Custom SocketModeReceiver implementation bypasses bolt-js limitation.

title: Calendar Awareness
description: Know Joi's schedule. Answer questions like 'is Joi free Thursday?' or 'when is Joi's next available slot?' by querying calendar.

title: Knowledge Bridge to Obsidian vault
description: Query Joi's Obsidian vault and knowledge systems. Surface relevant context during Slack conversations based on what's being discussed.

title: Proactive Updates
description: Notify relevant people when tasks they're waiting on are completed. Proactively share status updates without being asked.

title: Web interface for viewing/editing facts
description: Build a web UI to view and edit people facts. Should allow browsing all stored facts, editing existing facts, and deleting facts without using Slack commands.

title: Import/export facts
description: Add ability to export all facts to a portable format (JSON/CSV) and import facts from backup or another instance.
